argumentText:
ARGUMENT
e f p v

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-cycl | |- Cycles = ( v e. _V , e e. _V |-> { <. f , p >. | ( f ( v Paths e ) p /\ ( p ` 0 ) = ( p ` ( # ` f ) ) ) } ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_brovmpt2ex | |- ( F ( V Cycles E ) P -> ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_pthistrl | |- ( F ( V Paths E ) P -> F ( V Trails E ) P ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) ) -> ( F ( V Paths E ) P -> F ( V Trails E ) P ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anim1d | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) ) -> ( ( F ( V Paths E ) P /\ ( P ` 0 ) = ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) ) -> ( F ( V Trails E ) P /\ ( P ` 0 ) = ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_iscycl | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) ) -> ( F ( V Cycles E ) P <-> ( F ( V Paths E ) P /\ ( P ` 0 ) = ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_iscrct | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) ) -> ( F ( V Circuits E ) P <-> ( F ( V Trails E ) P /\ ( P ` 0 ) = ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_3imtr4d | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) ) -> ( F ( V Cycles E ) P -> F ( V Circuits E ) P ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_mpcom | |- ( F ( V Cycles E ) P -> F ( V Circuits E ) P ) |
